title: Admissibility Physics: A Constraint-First Framework for Fundamental Physics
description: Complete paper series and computational framework deriving the Standard Model, general relativity, and cosmological structure from five information-theoretic axioms. Includes Papers 1-7 (SPINE through ACTION), Evidence papers A-C, and the FCF Model Checker codebase with 67+ theorem verifications.
notes: February 2026 canonical release. Papers 1-7 updated with formalized cost parameters (ε, κ, η), executable certificates, Δ_geo closure, T4F capacity saturation (N_gen = 3), sin²θ_W = 3/13 derivation, and dark sector identification.
